title: Bottle Gourd Curry 🍛 | One pot cooking
content:
Side dish: Bottle Gourd curry | Sorakaya Kura Servings: 2 Duration: 20 minutes  All these fast flashing days reminds me to do things fast, everyone has their busy schedules at work, home, holidays, trips and tours and I prefer these one pot cooking whenever I was in rush to make food or on lazy mornings it’s as simple as that and I know people who are like me suggests ☺️ these kind of home cooking preps 😆 Okay, coming back to the main concept my new recipe is with bottle Gourd, as usual it has many health benefits and best to include in your diet. I like this Vegetable from childhood my mom frequently used bottle Gourd in different ways and one of my most favorite delicious recipe is Rice Flour Roti With Bottle Gourd 👌 / Tapilintu / Akki roti / Rice flour roti we call it ‘tapilintu’ aww! My mouthwatering thinking 💭 💭 of it, contains high carbs but we can eat once in a while 😉 I have shared few links with Bottle Gourd Recipes at the end of this post. Today, I made a simple - quick, one pot cooking recipe as a side dish with Sorakaya. Let’s start with Ingredients and Procedure Ingredients:
  • Bottle Gourd - 1/2 kg - Peeled off and chopped
  • Butter - 1 Tb sp
  • Cumin seeds - 1 tsp
  • Onion - 1 - finely chopped
  • Tomato 🍅 - 1 - finely chopped
  • Salt - 1/2 tsp
  • Red chilly Powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Coriander Powder - 1 Tb sp
  • Garam masala powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Coriander leaves - chopped - 1/3 cup
  • Turmeric Powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Water - 200 ml ( you can adjust according to your preference)
Procedure:
  • Add butter, cumin seeds in a medium heated pressure cooker
  • Saute a minute then add onion, sauté 2 minutes and add tomato 🍅
  • Saute 2 more minutes and add all spices and salt, mix well and add chopped Bottle Gourd along with coriander leaves
  • Gently mix, add water and pressure cook for two whistles
  • Bottle Gourd curry is ready to serve with piping hot roti or rice
  • Happy cooking and Have a good day 🙂
